decision_conditions: in accordance with plans KPCL2310473/5(Proposed Bike Shed & Bin Details), Construction Management Plan January Rev V1.1, Phase I Geo-Environmental Desk Study HSP2023-C4496-G-GPI-1908 November 2023, Arboricultural Report & Tree Protection Method Statement 15 November 2023 and Tree Protection Plan,  Materials:  Ibstock Brick Moseley A5162A Rusticated, VMZINC Standing Seam Zinc Cladding Colour Quartz,Bikebox Oxidised Finish by bikebox.london, GRP stone surrounds RAL1019 Grey Beige, Formica Bronze Brushed Aluminium D2126,GRP lintels and cills, Brett Omega Flow Permeable Block Paving
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Discharge of conditions of approved permission 3979/20: Protection of trees (Condition 3), Submission of material samples (Condition 4), Construction management and logistics plan (Condition 5), Permeable paving (Condition 6), Decontamination (Part Condition 14)(summary)
